action.name: Execute
action.execute: x-terminal-emulator -T "Arithmetic Quiz" -e sh -c "sh -c '/usr/games/arithmetic;echo PRESS ENTER;read line'"

action.name: Execute
action.execute: sh -c 'while /usr/games/fortune | col -x | xmessage -center -buttons OK:1,Another:0 -default OK -file - ; do :; done'

action.name: Execute
action.execute: x-terminal-emulator -T "Go Fish" -e sh -c "sh -c '/usr/games/go-fish;echo;echo PRESS ENTER;read line'"

action.name: Execute
action.execute: x-terminal-emulator -T "Air Traffic Controller" -e sh -c "sh -c '/usr/games/atc ; echo;echo PRESS ENTER;read line'"

action.name: Execute
action.execute: x-terminal-emulator -T "Bsd Tetris" -e sh -c "sh -c '/usr/games/tetris-bsd;echo;echo PRESS ENTER;read line'"
